mapper.select: SELECT th.regdate, th.id, tp.trade_id, tp.title, ts.status, tp.price, th.trade_type FROM trade_history th, trade_post tp, trade_status ts WHERE th.id=#{id} AND ts.trade_status_no=th.trade_status_no AND th.trade_post_no=tp.trade_post_no AND tp.board_type_no=board_type_no
mapper.update: update trade_history set trade_status_no=3 where trade_post_no=#{tradePostNo}
update trade_history set trade_status_no=4 where trade_post_no=#{tradePostNo} AND id=#{memberVO.id}
